Vendor.title: Vendor
Vendor.description: Represents a verified vendor in the marketplace.

businessName.description: The name of the vendor's business.

abn.description: Australian Business Number of the vendor.

email.description: Contact email address for the vendor.

phone.description: Contact phone number for the vendor.

stripeAccountId.description: Stripe account ID associated with the vendor, populated after successful hand-off.

Listing.title: Listing
Listing.description: Represents a marketplace listing offered by a vendor.

vendorId.description: The ID of the vendor who owns this listing.

listingName.description: The name of the product or service.

description.description: A detailed description of the listing.

category.description: The category that this listing belongs to.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image for the listing.

Resident.title: Resident
Resident.description: Represents a resident user of the application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

suburb.description: The suburb the resident lives in (e.g., Northcote).

/vendors/{vendorId}.description: Stores documents for each verified vendor.

/vendors/{vendorId}/listings/{listingId}.description: Stores all listings for a specific vendor as a sub-collection.

/residents/{residentId}.description: Stores public profiles for resident users.
